description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. [Buffalo team, International League, 1915] 1915. 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Original data provided by the Bain News Service on the negatives or caption cards: Buffalo team, Federal League, 1915. Corrected title and date based on research by the Pictorial History Committee, Society for American Baseball Research, 2008. Fred Beebe is in top row, far left. Joe Judge is in middle row, far left (Pictorial History Committee, Society for American Baseball Research, 2008). Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Baseball. Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.18950 Call Number: LC-B2- 3452-14
